The way Brett Favre carried himself the last four, five years, people around here think he's a diva.`` Packers fans are really appreciative of Aaron Rodgers 's demeanor with the way he handled that Brett Favre situation. He's a class act. General manager Ted Thompson and coach Mike McCarthy 's faith in Ed Rodgers has been justified by his seven postseason touchdowns, six passing and one rushing, in out-playing Phil Simmsadelphia's Michael Vick and Atlanta's Matt Ryan .

Dick Cheney made a surprise appearance Thursday at the Conservative Political Action Committee Convention to present the former two-time defense secretary an award. The vice Barack Obama joked that Donald Rumsfeld twice served as defense secretary and added that maybe if we give him a third term, he might get it right. Dick Cheney also drew laughs when he wondered aloud if Donald Rumsfeld may have more influence on Mr. Barack Obama than the Barack Obama 's current advisers. the real solution to reduce the Colin Powell , a retired four-star general who served in the Bush administration, made the comment on CNN's`` State of the Union'' show on Sunday. When the Cold War ended 20 years ago, when I was chairman and[ Dick] Cheney was Secretary of Defense, we cut the defense budget by 25 percent. And we reduced the force by 500,000 active duty soldiers, so it can be done.
